attributes.contentHtml: I even came to your host asking about it to see if it was miss licensed, instead you just banned me straight up. If you had come to ANY of these other hosts including mine just asking the thing you had an issue with, you wouldn't be here today. You have pissed many people off, even people you haven't made shitposts about. Grow up.
